snippet: Last year was a good one for the business of raising money. | Euro falls lower as central bank hints at stimulus. | A stress test for Mario Draghi. | Bitcoin Foundation parts ways with global policy counsel.
abstract: Last year was a good one for the business of raising money. | Euro falls lower as central bank hints at stimulus. | A stress test for Mario Draghi. | Bitcoin Foundation parts ways with global policy counsel.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Banner Year for Fund-Raising
